News, results from around Gisborne-East Coast golf courseshttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/07/25/news-results-from-around-gisborne-east-coast-golf-courses/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/07/25/news-results-from-around-gisborne-east-coast-golf-courses/ Chris TaewaSouth African has Poverty Bay senior club championship crown in his sights Wed, 24 Jul 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Cries of timber have been ringing out from the Electrinet Gisborne Park course in the wake of the recent storm and Gisborne District Council closing the course due to dangerous trees. A large number of trees have been felled and plenty more are due for the chop. The course has reopened and is temporarily reduced to nine holes. Photo / Chris Taewa
